name: places/ChIJ5ZBH17pZwokRO83U5Ifxixg
formattedAddress: 376 Bleecker St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 376 Bleecker St, New York, NY 10014-3210, USA

originalText.text: We went right at opening on a Sunday and could not have asked for a better experience! The girls working there were so sweet. I was very indecisive about my patches, but the girl was so patient and kind. Felt like I was shopping with a best friend! I wasn’t able to go back to the store to pick up my custom piece before leaving NYC, so I had it shipped home. It shipped out two days sooner than I was told! I can’t wait to receive it in the mail.

originalText.text: This is the WORST customer service I have ever experienced in my life.  I cannot get anyone live on the phone to address a problem and the email exchanges have been completely unprofessional.  My daughter's $350 backpack zipper broke and no one seems to care or help me fix or replace it.  I have spent thousands of dollars on products here and will never buy anything here again!!!  Poor quality products with even poorer level of customer care.

originalText.text: Here is how I received my customized items. Completely crooked and destroyed. Like everyone else says, you won't be greeted by anyone when you walk in. The people working here with the exception of one person, could care less about the brand and are too busy texting and chatting amongst themselves to help you. Don't waste your time or money.

The people working here with the exception of one person, could care less about the brand and are too busy texting and chatting amongst themselves to help you. Don't waste your time or money.

originalText.text: Working for this company has been the worst! Management is horrible; they do not care about their employees and speak to them very disparagingly. No growth or raises are expected, and dictatorship at its best. Management complains daily about the work flow and pressures employees to "work with a sense of urgency" by micromanaging. There are no equal opportunities for black employees, and the workplace is segregated. I recommend not working here; it is mentally draining and a toxic work environment. Products are also over priced, and unsanitary with mold and very low quality. You can buy the same designs elsewhere for cheaper, just Google it!

originalText.text: I had such a good experience in this store! I went on a Sunday and was greeted right away. I wandered for a bit but decided to think about it, so I left and ended up coming back later that day because I knew the employees would help! I picked out a Fanny pack and worked with the girl at the patch bar to figure out my design and she was so helpful and patient with me deciding! I’ve been wanting a bag from this brand for a while and I had a great experience in the store so I’ll definitely come back again.
